A statement from David Cameron read: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson 's position had appeared tenuous for several months as the row over phone hacking at the News of the World intensified.
